name: DriftForce (itch)
description:
DriftForce is a super fast endless racing game. Easy to learn, hard to master. Maneuver through the procedurally generated maps and avoid obstacles while collecting score.

Inspired by past arcade games with a focus on high scores, DriftForce is about short, intense runs. Collect score, don't crash and survive as long as you can!

Controls are simple and easy to learn, maneuver your drone, use a shield to slide on walls and boost your way to a new high score.

Features:
  • Race at high speeds that increase the longer you make it.
  • Endless procedurally generated tracks.
  • 4 modes with thousands of possible tracks generated with seeds.
  • Choose from several drones and customize its colors.

Fully compatible with mouse & keyboard or XInput controller.

Steam key is included with purchase, steam is required for online leaderboards.

System Requirements:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 900 series or equivalent
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
